abstract: Sanofi proposed to Genzyme’s board paying about $69 a share, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.
snippet: Sanofi proposed to Genzyme’s board paying about $69 a share, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.
lead_paragraph: 8:46 a.m. | Updated As Sanofi-Aventis begins holding merger negotiations with Genzyme — after sending a letter outlining a potential takeover worth up to $18.4 billion, people briefed on the matter told DealBook on Monday — the French drug maker will have challenges to contend with.

headline.main: Challenges Await Sanofi as Genzyme Talks Begin

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
